#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int fibonacci(unsigned long long n)
{
    unsigned long long a=0,b=1,c=0;vector<unsigned long long> vec;;
    while(c<n)
    {
        c=a+b;
        a=b;
        b=c;
        vec.push_back(c);
    }
    return vec.size();
}
int main()
{
    unsigned long long a,b;int c,d;
    while(1)
    {
        cin>>a>>b;
        if(a==0 && b==0)
           break;
       cout<<fibonacci(b)-fibonacci(a)<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
